Package squidpony.squidai.astar

Interface Connection<N>

Type Parameters:
N - Type of node
All Known Implementing Classes:
CostlyConnection, DefaultConnection
public interface Connection<N>
A connection between two nodes of the Graph. The connection has a non-negative cost that often represents time or distance. However, the cost can be anything you want, for instance a combination of time, distance, and other factors. Possible such factors could be how dangerous or unpleasant it seems to go between two nodes, how much it costs to make payments to use toll roads, whether a specific path crosses an international border, and so on.
Author:
davebaol

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double getCost()
    Returns the non-negative cost of this connection
    N getFromNode()
    Returns the node that this connection came from
    N getToNode()
    Returns the node that this connection leads to
